CustomField.description:
The Netsuite internal ID of the payment period. Can be found here:
https://system.eu2.netsuite.com/app/common/otherlists/accountingotherlists.nl?tname=terms&sortcol=&sortdir=ASC&csv=HTML&OfficeXML=F&pdf=&size=1000&showall=F&_eml_nkey_=243375169#
CustomField.formula: CASE(Opportunity.Payment_Period__c, "Due on receipt",4, "15 days",25, "30 days",2, "45 days",7, "60 days",3, "75 days",5, "90 days",8, "120 days",9, "150 days",33, "180 days",32, "30 Days ME", 29, "60 Days ME", 30, "90 Days ME", 31,0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Netsuite internal ID of the payment period.
CustomField.label: Payment Period
